row.entry: This panel lets you use a powerful functionality of darktable: to store and apply a history stack. Styles are created in darkroom mode thanks to a button placed below the history stack. Then they are managed thanks to this panel, that allows you to apply and delete a style.

sect4.title: create duplicate
sect4.para: When applying a style on selected images, activate this box lets you create a duplicate before applying the styles and thus avoiding you to create multiple duplicates before trying various styles on it.
